name: Mini Wheels
description:
Mini Wheels is an arcade fantasy racing game with story mode and appealing graphics. Local and online multiplayer capacity, innovative racing power-ups and game modes.



Mini Wheels sets itself aside from other arcade racers by including an appealing and interesting story to be played in campaign single player mode. Not leaving aside the must haves of the genre, the game includes 4 player local multiplayer and up to 8 online multiplayer.

A brief of the story:


Pipo is Mick's favorite racing toy. After moving to a new place, Pipo gets trapped in a basement of a suburban house, and struggles to find a way back into his owner's hands.
Willing to escape, he will have to challenge other characters that rule different parts of the house, finding himself in places he has never seen before and meeting many friends and foes.

Are you ready to embark on this little, not so little story?
